motu.name: Cure Wounds
motu.description: Channels divine energy to heal minor wounds
motu.hit_message: Divine light mends wounds, restoring {damage} hit points!

kamotu.name: Heal
kamotu.description: Invokes divine power to heal moderate wounds
kamotu.hit_message: Sacred energy flows through {target}, restoring {damage} hit points!

tami.name: Sacred Flame
tami.description: Conjures a beam of holy light that smites enemies
tami.cast_message: {caster} conjures a beam of holy light, smiting {target}!
tami.hit_message: Holy radiance sears evil for {damage} radiant damage!

dobudanimaru.name: Neutralize Poison
dobudanimaru.description: Creates a purifying mist that cures poison from all allies
dobudanimaru.cast_message: {caster} creates a purifying mist that cleanses all allies!
dobudanimaru.hit_message: The sacred mist purges poison from all who breathe it!

gimotu.name: Greater Heal
gimotu.description: Calls upon divine grace to heal grievous wounds
gimotu.hit_message: Brilliant divine light knits wounds together, restoring {damage} hit points!

katami.name: Searing Light
katami.description: Unleashes a powerful beam of holy radiance
katami.cast_message: {caster} unleashes a powerful beam of holy radiance at {target}!
katami.hit_message: Sacred light burns through darkness for {damage} radiant damage!

motumaru.name: Mass Cure
motumaru.description: Spreads healing mist that restores vitality to all allies
motumaru.cast_message: {caster} spreads a healing mist across the battlefield!
motumaru.hit_message: Divine mist washes over allies, restoring {damage} hit points to all!

gitami.name: Flame Strike
gitami.description: Channels divine wrath into a brilliant beam of searing light
gitami.cast_message: {caster} channels divine wrath, unleashing brilliant light at {target}!
gitami.hit_message: Brilliant divine fire sears through evil for {damage} radiant damage!

kamotumaru.name: Mass Heal
kamotumaru.description: Calls forth a blessed mist that heals all allies in the area
kamotumaru.cast_message: {caster} calls forth a blessed mist to heal all allies!
kamotumaru.hit_message: Blessed mist suffuses allies with healing, restoring {damage} hit points!

kusamotu.name: Supreme Heal
kusamotu.description: Invokes divine intervention to heal even the most grievous wounds
kusamotu.cast_message: {caster} invokes divine intervention, bathing {target} in radiant light!
kusamotu.hit_message: Divine intervention mends even mortal wounds, restoring {damage} hit points!

kusatami.name: Pillar of Flame
kusatami.description: Calls down a devastating pillar of divine fire to smite enemies
kusatami.cast_message: {caster} calls down a pillar of divine fire upon {target}!
kusatami.hit_message: Divine fire incinerates evil for {damage} radiant damage!

gimotumaru.name: Greater Mass Heal
gimotumaru.description: Summons a powerful healing mist blessed by the divine
gimotumaru.cast_message: {caster} summons a powerful healing mist blessed by the divine!
gimotumaru.hit_message: Sacred mist envelops all allies, restoring {damage} hit points!

kusamotumaru.name: Supreme Mass Heal
kusamotumaru.description: Manifests divine presence as a miraculous healing mist
kusamotumaru.cast_message: {caster} manifests divine presence as a miraculous healing mist!
kusamotumaru.hit_message: Miraculous divine energy flows through all allies, restoring {damage} hit points!
